message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this incredible product, and I think you'll find it's well worth the investment.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe it's a bit higher than I'm willing to go.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $850000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $750000, but that's as high as I can go. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable selling the product at $750000. I'm willing to make one more offer, and I'm willing to meet you at $825000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than my previous offer of $750000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
